items.title: The Grand Roster of W2SZ
items.content_html:
This is a non-exhaustive roster of past and present membership and those affiliated with W2SZ.

Updates

We rely on crowd-sourcing to make information accurate and updated. To nominate a W2SZ-affiliated individual, fill out this form.

The Grand Roster

Callsign Name Class Year QRZ Link Comment
KD2TAI Hisen Zhang 2023 Here
W1OG Ted Reimann 2013 Here Old call, KB1NTJ. Past W2SZ President.
AC2YD Ben Cahill 1977 Here I was the equipment manager for W2SZ for at least one year, probably 1975-76 school year. I graduated one semester early, in December ‘76 (class of ‘77), so I probably was not equipment manager for 76-77 school year. I carried on the traditional report, “Some of the equipment is working, and some of it isn’t”, that my predecessor passed down to me! At the time, I was WB2PWS (advanced class). I let my license drop after college, just got re-licensed in late 2018 as Extra, back on the air in 2020 … built Softrock RXTX Ensemble kit, been happily QRP CW ever since … largely contesting!
AD2CC Saied Seghatoleslami 1974 Here Happy to be here
K2TRY Gary G. Nelson 1970 Here I live in Troy and always willing to help out on construction and other projects.

THE END OF LIST.

items.title: AC2YD - Ben Cahill
items.content_html:
I was the equipment manager for W2SZ for at least one year, probably 1975-76 school year. I graduated one semester early, in December ‘76 (class of ‘77), so I probably was not equipment manager for 76-77 school year. I carried on the traditional report, “Some of the equipment is working, and some of it isn’t”, that my predecessor passed down to me! I can’t remember his name. :-(

At the time, I was WB2PWS (advanced class). I let my license drop after college, just got re-licensed in late 2018 as Extra, back on the air in 2020 … built Softrock RXTX Ensemble kit, been happily QRP CW ever since … largely contesting!
